issue.title: [JS] Update arrow2csv to new Row API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4674](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4674). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `arrow2csv` utility uses `row.length` to measure cells, but now that we've made Rows use Symbols for their internal properties, it should enumerate the values with the iterator.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4674?focusedCommentId=16778073) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3747
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3747>
